clang-analyzer-webkit.RefCntblBaseVirtua.description:
Description

clang-analyzer-webkit.RefCntblBaseVirtualDtor
Check for any ref-countable base class having virtual destructor.
The
clang-analyzer-webkit.RefCntblBaseVirtualDtor
check is an alias, please see
Clang Static Analyzer Available Checkers
for more information.
clang-analyzer-webkit.RefCntblBaseVirtua.option:
Static analysis (Clang-Tidy) options are configured via .clang-tidy file.

This rule has no specific options.
